lender.name: Eric Leaphart
lender.loan_because: The Leaphart Family funds are being offered in the memory of Bill Leaphart who passed on April 13, 2010. The Family recognizes that people are at their best when they can control their own fate. And with a nickname of "Wild Bill" he would of had it no other way. We believe that widespread changes focused on solving social problems, such as disease and poverty, come in small steps taken at the community level by an thoughtful individual seeking independance. With these funds we hope to help ...

lender.name: Jason
lender.occupational_info:
I'm a freelance writer with several hundred published articles online on the subject of bad credit auto loans and secondary financing. With several years of experience in automotive sales, this has been an easy transition.
Many people that have credit problems seek out personal loans for cars. This however, can be very risky for both parties.
With the availability of good auto loans through online networks, people that have credit problems would do themselves well to explore the opportunities available through reputable companies that provide secondary auto finance.

lender.name: Lawrence Woodmere Acad.
lender.loan_because: We loan because we feel that people around the world need help, and every little bit of help that can be given to them should be given to them. Every person, regardless of whether they live in a rich or poor country, if put in a position with money as an issue, should have a chance to obtain that money, and being the people to help that person is a great feeling and a great thing to do. We loan because we want to. Moreover, these loans are not charity: they are helping people help themselves to revitalize their communities through useful businesses.
lender.occupational_info: We are a K-12 independent school in Woodmere, New York, on the South Shore of Long Island.

lender.name: SharonCrawford
lender.loan_because: My own vision through my work is to empower people to take responsibility for their own life & happiness, then help others to do the same. I believe that giving micro-loans to aspiring entrepreneurs is a fantastic way of helping those people to do that in their own communities, which they otherwise may never have the opportunity. I prefer this over direct charitable giving in some ways, as it encourages people & communities to help themselves, in order to become independent & self-sustainable.
lender.occupational_info: Empowering people to take responsibility for their life & happiness, in order to feel good & achieve their desires. I do this through online events & programmes, through developing a like-minded community & also coaching & mentoring. I'd love you to join me at facebook.com/SharonCrawfordFGN or facebook.com/FeelGoodNow

lender.name: Mel
lender.loan_because: extreme poverty leads to abuses of basic human rights - by helping people help themselves it's possible to create new futures for millions who otherwise despair... Freeing people from financial and physical slavery is my key goal for the future...
lender.occupational_info: I play the drums, mostly rock music -- music is more than a job it's my passion! I also work in a store and I'm learning to use my computer to spread the word about changing poverty - to market new ways of getting people involved in making positive changes, for themselves and others!

lender.name: salvador
lender.loan_because: i want to add my initial capital in my starting business as networker

lender.name: Shrink Polymer Systems
lender.loan_because: It's nice to try and support people who are prepared to work hard and support themselves and their family where help may not be available from normal methods such as banks etc.
lender.occupational_info: Well, most of my work is spent on a computer, designing electrical cable joints and terminations, then bidding for tenders and quotes in most parts of the world. Can you see my square eyes?

lender.name: David Melendez
lender.loan_because: You shall love your neighbor as yourself.

lender.name: Judy
lender.loan_because: I was inspired by my optimistic husband.

lender.name: Cherokee Interact Club
lender.loan_because: The Cherokee Interact Club is a youth service club sponsored by the Rotary Club of Canton. We are comprised of high-school aged children who are interested in serving our communities and world.
lender.occupational_info: We organize numerous community (local) and international service projects annually, all aimed at benefiting society either in our area or other parts of the world. We are a relatively young club and are interested in using Kiva as a starting point of our international service.

lender.name: Ruby
lender.loan_because: I believe in empowering our less fortunate human family, giving them opportunities to improve their standard of living, become economically independent and alleviate poverty for themselves and their communities.

lender.name: Renee and Jason
lender.loan_because: We loan because poverty is not fought through hand-outs.

lender.name: Herman
lender.occupational_info: engineering the HW and SW printprocesses of highvolume printers.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: As a small business owner I relate to the need for financing to start or continue to operate a business. In addition a loan can help people improve their lives and pursue their dreams
lender.occupational_info: Small business owner managing retail sales of Digital Photo ID Systems through out the US.

lender.name: Nonie and David Williams
lender.loan_because: We believe in the empowerment of the individual and our responsibility as Global Citizens to assist where possible.
lender.occupational_info: We are Canadian Bah√°'√≠s retired and living on Galiano Island, BC, Canada and in Jocotepec, Jalisco, Mexico.

lender.name: Christopher
lender.loan_because: I care.

lender.name: Kimberly
lender.loan_because: I just want to be helpful.
lender.occupational_info: I work for on the website for my local newspaper. I make sure all the advertisements show up properly on the site. I also get to design advertisements, too.
